name: Deep Breath (Nerovia)
description:
Deep Breath is a puzzle platformer, where you control a diver and have to recover sunken treasures from the bottom of the ocean.

This game was made for the GDEX 2021 Game Jam and was created over a period of seven days.

Controls

Press ESC to pause or restart. Use W, A, S, D to move around, and press SPACE to interact with other objects or to clear obstacles in your way. Get hold of the treasure and bring it back to the surface. All actions cost you different amounts of oxygen:

  • 1 Unit for moving sideways
  • 5 Units for clearing obstacles
  • Moving up and down is free
  • Holding the treasure will double all costs
  • Interacting with anemones will refill your oxygen.
Credits

Alphabeta Font - Brian Kent 
BitmGothic Font - Nomi
Sound Effects - Mixkit
